content: this hat is a mashup of the melt the ice hat which itself is modeled on the hats worn by the norwegian resistance in wwii and the pussy hat it is designed to be beginner-friendly and instantly recognizable this hat uses basic stitches and is infinitely customizable in yarn and needle size length of ribbing bind-off technique and tassels the unifying element is the color red and the tassel embellishment with recognition and thanks to kat coyle https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pussyhat-project krista suh and yarncultmn https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/melt-the-ice-hat this pattern is free but please consider making a donation to your local resistance non-profit
